Name: Sea Breeze
Description: Similar to a Bay Breeze, but with Grapefruit juice.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Similar a un Brisa bahía, pero con jugo de toronja.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ähnlich wie die Brise in der Bucht, aber mit Grapefruitsaft.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Semblable au Brise de la baie, mais avec du jus de pamplemousse.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Similiar ao uma brisa da baía, mas com suco de Toranja.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Похож на Гнедой бриз, но с грейпфрутовым соком.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Körfez Rüzgarı'na benziyor ama içinde Greyfurt Suyu var.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 海风。与海湾清风鸡尾酒相似，但不同之处是加入了西柚汁。
